'''"Naught but Indignation for the People's Lot"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "Naught but Indignation for the People's Lot" is obtained from reaching 1,000 Festive Fever during the [[Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze]] event.
